name: Roomy's Room
description:
You are an introvert who enjoys dancing and partying alone. It does not take long for intruders to come in and party with you, uninvited. You don't like them, so avoid them all for as long as you can!

Goal:
Do not get knocked outside of the screen's boundaries for as long as you can.

Controls:
Arrow keys or WASD:  Moves your character.
Enter or Space:  Restarts the game when on the game over screen.

Notes:
The knockback intensity increases the more you get hit, therefore you must avoid as many intruders as you can before the room gets full for a higher chance to stay at the party!

This is a short game made for Ludum Dare 42 over a weekend. It was intended to be for the Compo submission, but the polishing was done after the 2-day time limit. The theme was "Running Out of Space".

Made with MonoGame, FL Studio & Photoshop.

Programming, Art and Music by Lexyvil (Alexandre Laframboise)
